However even so these areas still don't necessarily follow strict schedules compared against other school facilities because regular touchpoints aren't very high especially without mentioning anything involving shared resources among different groups beyond direct student interaction itself . 0.user_question: Given a list of conditions, please answer the question. Condition 1: 9642627 teachers use a single classroom. Condition 2: Every teacher conducts two lessons per day. Conclusion (Condition): The whiteboard undergoes maintenance during both sets of lessons conducted on it. So, considering one set as 'lesson', we can conclude - For condition when Lesson = n then Cleanup needed would be equal to Double of "n" i.e., 2 * n. Hence Answer=For One Day [Clean Up Needed] = Total No Of Teachers* Number Of Lesser Per Person*(Number OF Times White Board Get Cleans PER LESSON)=9642627*2*3= 5785576
